mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT * FROM recipe WHERE M_ID = #{mId} ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT r.rest_id "rId", r.REST_NAME "restName", rr.m_id "mId", rr.REST_RESERV_DATE "restReservDate", rr.REST_RESERV_NAME "restReservName", rr.REST_RESERV_PEOPLE "restReservPeople", rr.REST_RESERV_STATUS "restReservStatus" FROM RESTAURANT r JOIN REST_RESERV rr ON r.REST_ID = rr.REST_ID WHERE rr.m_id = #{mId} ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT m.meet_id "meetId", m.meet_title "meetTitle", m.meet_start "meetStart", m.meet_end "meetEnd", p.my_fund "myFund", p.today_flag "todayFlag", p.achiv "achiv", m.total_day "totalDay", trunc ( trunc( ((sysdate ) - m.meet_start)) / m.total_day *100 ) "dayAchiv" FROM meet_un m JOIN meet_parti p ON m.meet_id = p.meeT_id WHERE p.m_id = #{mId} ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT m.meet_title "meetTitle", m.meet_start "meetStart", m.meet_end "meetEnd", p.my_fund "myFund", p.today_flag "todayFlag", p.achiv "achiv" FROM meet_un m JOIN meet_parti p ON m.meet_id = p.meeT_id WHERE p.m_id = #{mId} ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end } )

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT m.meet_title "meetTitle", m.meet_start "meetStart", m.meet_end "meetEnd", m.meet_participant "meetParticipant", m.meet_fund "meetFund", p.meet_id "meetId", m.total_day "totalDay", sum(achiv) "achiv", NVL(sum(achiv)/m.meet_participant,0) "allAchiv", trunc ( trunc( ((sysdate + 1) - m.meet_start)) / m.total_day *100 ) "dayAchiv" FROM meet_un m LEFT OUTER JOIN meet_parti p ON m.meet_id = p.meet_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mId} GROUP BY p.meet_id, m.meet_title, m.meet_start, m.meet_end, m.meet_participant, m.meet_fund, m.total_day ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT m.meet_title "meetTitle", m.meet_start "meetStart", m.meet_end "meetEnd", m.meet_participant "meetParticipant", m.meet_fund "meetFund", p.meet_id "meetId", sum(achiv) "achiv", sum(achiv)/m.meet_participant "allAchiv" FROM meet_un m JOIN meet_parti p ON m.meet_id = p.meet_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mId} GROUP BY p.meet_id, m.meet_title, m.meet_start, m.meet_end, m.meet_participant, m.meet_fund ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end })

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT b.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT c.c_join "cJoin", c.c_parti "cParti", c.c_id "cId", c.c_title "cTitle", c.c_start "cStart", c.c_end "cEnd", c.c_img "cImg", c.c_desc "cDesc", c.status "cStatus", cr.m_id "mId" FROM CLASS_RESERV cr JOIN CLASS c ON cr.c_id = c.c_id WHERE cr.m_id = #{mId } ) b ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT c.c_title "cTitle", c.c_start "cStart", c.c_end "cEnd", c.c_img "cImg", c.c_desc "cDesc", c.status "cStatus", cr.m_id "mId" FROM CLASS_RESERV cr JOIN CLASS c ON cr.c_id = c.c_id WHERE cr.m_id = #{mId} )

select m.meet_id "meetId", m.meet_title "meetTitle", m.meet_pic "meetPic", li.origin_id "originId", m.meet_start "meetStart", m.meet_end "meetEnd", m.m_id "mId", m.meet_fund "meetFund", li.like_date from like_list li join meet_un m on li.origin_id = m.meet_id where li.m_id=#{mId} order by li.like_date desc

SELECT c.c_id "cId", c.c_title "cTitle", c.c_img "cImg", c.vegtype "vegType", c.c_start "cStart", c.c_end "cEnd", c.status "status", c.c_hit "cHit", li.origin_id "originId", li.like_date FROM like_list li JOIN class c ON li.origin_id = c.c_id WHERE li.m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY li.like_date desc

SELECT r.r_id "rId", li.origin_id "originId", r.r_title "rTitle", r.r_type "rType", r.r_image "rImage", r.r_hit "rHit", r.m_id "mId", li.like_date FROM like_list li JOIN recipe r ON li.origin_id = r.r_id WHERE li.m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY li.like_date desc

SELECT r.rest_id "rId", li.origin_id "originId", r.rest_name "restName", r.rest_address "restAddress", r.rest_pic "restPic", r.rest_tel "restTel", r.rest_review_count "restReviewCount", li.like_date FROM like_list li JOIN restaurant r ON li.origin_id = r.rest_id WHERE li.m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY li.like_date desc
